text: The Federal University, Lokoja, popularly known as Fulokoja, is a federal university in the confluence city of Lokoja, the capital of Kogi State, North- Central Nigeria. Lokoja lies at the confluence of the Niger and Benue rivers. The Federal University, Lokoja was established in February 2011 by the Federal Government of Nigeria as a result of indispensable need to create more universities in the country. ==Faculties== *Faculty of Sciences *Faculty of Arts *Faculty of Social Science *Faculty of Management Science *Faculty of Education ==See also== *List of universities in Nigeria ==References== Category:Public universities in Nigeria Category:Universities and colleges in Nigeria Category:Kogi State Category:Educational institutions established in 2011 Category:2011 establishments in Nigeria
